review_blob: This is a perfect Pils. Not too demanding, clean crisp, slight bittnerness in the middle.
Head was large and foamy. Aroma was modest wheat. Color bright gold. The taste blew me away..solid notes of citrus with a platform of clove, banana.

Hint of apple in the nose. Color is pale apple with many bibbles lighting it. What I really liked was the delicate true flavor of apple. Not a fan of the sugar ciders..this tasted of soft apple, very refreshing.
beer_name: Docs Draft Original Hard Apple Cider
